name: Gooby and the Quest for Ramm
name_original: Gooby and the Quest for Ramm
description:
All assets created by me except for the music which was provided by Purple Planet.

First university project and first ever 2D project! (Severely unfinished and possibly never going to be finished).

NOTE: Couldn't get proper dialogue to work so I recommend just walking around and clicking on every character until they have notable differences to their sprites. (some you may have to talk to more than once). You'll know when you've done everything when the house next to the little yellow bird is open to you.

After losing his friend Ramm while on an adventure with her, Gooby finds himself in an unfamiliar land where the residents are birds and when you want information, you have to carry out a favour in order to obtain that information.

Controls: Point and click with the mouse and the left mouse button, respectively.

Instructions for installation: Download .zip file and extract, run the .exe file from the extracted folder or from a desktop/taskbar shortcut (DO NOT TAKE .EXE OUT OF EXTRACTED FOLDER).
